name: Levis 721 High Rise Skinny Jeans - Women's
description: A high-rise skinny jean you can dress up or down depending on your mood. A hint of spandex means they won't hold you back if you feel a high kick coming on.5-pocket layout for all your day-to-day necessities.Slim through the hips and thighs for streamlined silhouette.Skinny leg, high-rise merges that classic skinny-jean profile with the high-waisted retro look.Just a touch of spandex for an extra bit of stretch.Levi’s sources more than 17% of its cotton through the Better Cotton Initiative (BCI). The BCI is a not-for-profit association committed to a holistic approach to sustainable cotton production.
